query:
SELECT id as "id!: i32", 
job_id as "job_id!: i32", 
campaign_id as "campaign_id!: i32" FROM on_chain_job_campaigns WHERE (NOT $1::boolean OR id = $2::int4) AND (NOT $3::boolean OR job_id = $4::int4) AND (NOT $5::boolean OR campaign_id = $6::int4) ORDER BY 
      (CASE ($7 = 'Id' AND NOT $8) WHEN true THEN id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($7 = 'Id' AND $8) WHEN true THEN id ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($7 = 'JobId' AND NOT $8) WHEN true THEN job_id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($7 = 'JobId' AND $8) WHEN true THEN job_id ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($7 = 'CampaignId' AND NOT $8) WHEN true THEN campaign_id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($7 = 'CampaignId' AND $8) WHEN true THEN campaign_id ELSE NULL END) DESC
     LIMIT $9 OFFSET $10 FOR UPDATE
